msg.proton.cmd.help: Execute "/proton help" to figure out the correct usage of the proton commands.
msg.proton.err.eepInit: You should never use the mod on the client side if you want to play on a server.
msg.proton.group.dissociate.self: Group cannot be dissociated from itself...
msg.proton.group.dissociate.failure: Group {1} may not be a child of group {0}
msg.proton.group.addPerm.failure: Failed to add perm {0} into group {1}.
msg.proton.group.delPerm.failure: Failed to remove perm {0} from group {1}.
msg.proton.player.addToGroup.failure: Failed to add player {1} to group {0}.
msg.proton.player.removeFromGroup.failur: Failed to remove player {1} from group {0}.
msg.proton.player.dissociate.failure: Failed to dissociate group {0} from player {1}.
msg.proton.player.addPerm.failure: Failed to add perm {0} to player {1}.
msg.proton.player.delPerm.failure: Failed to remove perm {0} from player {1}.
